curam.util.rules

Class RulesObjectiveResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.rules.RulesObjectiveResult

  • public final class RulesObjectiveResult
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains information about the achieved objective. Its existence in the RulesResult.getRulesObjectiveResultList() indicates that the objective defined in a rule set has succeeded. It will contain information about the actual rate applicable to specific conditions if the objective defined using the Rules Editor contains Objective Tags of financial or numerical type.

    Other related financial and non-financial information is contained in one or more TagResultobjects.

    Objectives are defined at design time using the Rules Editor.
